turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coul you order me an espresso machiato from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location do you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm heading into Asheville, NC right now. Could you find me one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are several to choose from, including on Tunnel Road, Merrimon Ave, Patton Ave, and Charlotte St.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm closest to Merrimon Avenue, so I'll do that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so this is the Starbucks at 915 Merrimon Ave in Asheville. What size drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Quad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut if they have it, or almond otherwise.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have coconut. Do you want any flavors added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just as is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream, sugar, or honey added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a little bit of honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that's going to be $4.65. Is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Was there anything else you needed or should I put in the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the macchiato, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I put in the order and it will be ready for you at the Starbucks on 915 Merrimon Ave in Asheville.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks for your help!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a great rest of your day!
